basic_info.name: Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology Highlights
Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology Courses and Fees
description: Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) offers the courses at various Undergraduate and Postgraduate levels. The Institute is forerunner for designing and initiating novel programmes that are relevant to the demands of the current technical trends. The developments, both in terms of infrastructure and academic matters, have gained momentum over the last fifteen years. The Institute organizes conferences, seminars, workshops, FDPs (Faculty Development Program), MOOCs (Massive open online course) and guest lectures throughout the academic year. Student chapters of IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) CSI (Computer Society of India), IET (The Institution of Engineering & Technology), ACM (Association for Computing Machinery), IETE (The Institution of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineers), AIMA (All India Management Association), CII (Confederation of Indian Industry), ISTE (India Society for Technical Education), FAPCCI (The Federation of Andhra Pradesh Chambers & Commerce), TCS iON, MICROSOFT IT Academy, ORACLE Academy and many more have been established to keep the students updated with latest trends followed in these professional societies.

It also offers several diploma courses. The Undergraduate courses of the institute include B. Tech, Postgraduate courses include M. Tech, MBA and diploma courses include the polytechnic degree. The detailed information regarding the courses of the DIET, Visakhapatnam are as follows:
Read more: DIET Visakhapatnam Courses and Fees

basic_info.name: Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology Placement
description: The Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous), Visakhapatnam has a well-organized and well-equipped Training and Placement Assistance Cell. DIET recognizes that students come to study as a step towards building a career in the field of Engineering and Management. The institute mainly focuses on the improvement of career prospects. The institute employs reputed professionals to conduct special training programmes in various branches of engineering and management. It also focuses on the basics required in the process of the placement like English Communication, Group Discussion and Personality Development skills.

The institute endeavors to create a healthy atmosphere, where equal opportunity of learning is provided to all the students, irrespective of caste, religion, gender, financial background, color and creed. Coupled with the theme of integration and harmony, the institution aims at grooming and empowering the young techies, so as to make them intellectually competent, spiritually mature, morally upright, psychologically integrated, socially accepted as good citizens and good human beings. DIET has strived hard to utilize the potency of the Institution to its fullest extent and this has borne fruit in all spheres of individual and collective efforts. The highest package offered to the student is 8 LPA and the average package offered is 4 LPA. basic_info.name: Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology FAQs

faqs.question: Does Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) provide part time courses?
faqs.answer: Ans.No, Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) does not provide any part-time courses. It only offers full time regular courses.Read more:DIET Visakhapatnam Courses and Fees

faqs.question: How can students apply for admission at Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous)?
faqs.answer: Ans.The candidates can easily apply online by visiting the official site of the Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) .

faqs.question: Does Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) provide hostel facilities for the students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, Hostels/paying guest accommodations are available for boys and girls separately near the campus of Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous).Check:DIET Visakhapatnam Hostel

faqs.question: What are the scholarships offered at Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous)?
faqs.answer: Ans.Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) awards scholarships to the needy and meritorious students every year.Check:DIET Visakhapatnam Scholarship

Section.name: About DIET
Section.description:
Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) - [DIET], Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh was established in the year of 2006. The institute was founded by Sri Dadi Veerabhadra Rao, an esteemed academician, former minister, and opposition leader in the State Legislative Council of Andhra Pradesh. It is affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTUK), Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh for the Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses. All the relevant programs of the institute are approved by the All-India Council for Technical Education, New Delhi. It is recognized by the UGC. DIET is one of the preferred and leading institution under Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kakinada. It has been accredited by NAAC with a grade “B+”. and also by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA).
The institute offers different courses across the 2 streams namely Engineering and Management. It is a matter of great pride that the institute has bagged several prestigious awards like- “Best Infrastructure in AP” Award in 2016, “Engineering Excellence Award” in 2012 and 2016 , 4 star ranked Institute in 2021 by Institution’s Innovation Council, MHRD Government of India, Band performer in 2021 by Atal Ranking of Institutions on Innovation Achievements (ARIIA) along with International Quality Certifications, ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015 and ISO 45001:2018 and was Ranked “A” Grade by Government of A.P. and Knowledge Mission Ranking.
Check: DIET Visakhapatnam Admission
Table of Content
NAAC with ‘A’ Grade and Inclusion u/s 2(f) & 12(B) of UGC Act
Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) offers the courses at various Undergraduate and Postgraduate levels. The Institute is forerunner for designing and initiating novel programmes that are relevant to the demands of the current technical trends. The developments, both in terms of infrastructure and academic matters, have gained momentum over the last fifteen years. The Institute organizes conferences, seminars, workshops, FDPs (Faculty Development Program), MOOCs (Massive open online course) and guest lectures throughout the academic year. Student chapters of IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) CSI (Computer Society of India), IET (The Institution of Engineering & Technology), ACM (Association for Computing Machinery), IETE (The Institution of Electronics & Telecommunication Engineers), AIMA (All India Management Association), CII (Confederation of Indian Industry), ISTE (India Society for Technical Education), FAPCCI (The Federation of Andhra Pradesh Chambers & Commerce), TCS iON, MICROSOFT IT Academy, ORACLE Academy and many more have been established to keep the students updated with latest trends followed in these professional societies.
It also offers several diploma courses. The Undergraduate courses of the institute include B. Tech, Postgraduate courses include M. Tech, MBA and diploma courses include the polytechnic degree. The detailed information regarding the courses of the DIET, Visakhapatnam are as follows:

The Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous), Visakhapatnam has a well-organized and well-equipped Training and Placement Assistance Cell. DIET recognizes that students come to study as a step towards building a career in the field of Engineering and Management. The institute mainly focuses on the improvement of career prospects. The institute employs reputed professionals to conduct special training programmes in various branches of engineering and management. It also focuses on the basics required in the process of the placement like English Communication, Group Discussion and Personality Development skills.
The institute endeavors to create a healthy atmosphere, where equal opportunity of learning is provided to all the students, irrespective of caste, religion, gender, financial background, color and creed. Coupled with the theme of integration and harmony, the institution aims at grooming and empowering the young techies, so as to make them intellectually competent, spiritually mature, morally upright, psychologically integrated, socially accepted as good citizens and good human beings. DIET has strived hard to utilize the potency of the Institution to its fullest extent and this has borne fruit in all spheres of individual and collective efforts. The highest package offered to the student is 8 LPA and the average package offered is 4 LPA. Ques. Does Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) provide part time courses?
Ans. No, Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) does not provide any part-time courses. It only offers full time regular courses.
Read more: DIET Visakhapatnam Courses and Fees
Ques. How can students apply for admission at Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous)?
Ans. The candidates can easily apply online by visiting the official site of the Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) .
Ques. Does Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) provide hostel facilities for the students?
Ans. Yes, Hostels/paying guest accommodations are available for boys and girls separately near the campus of Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous).
Check: DIET Visakhapatnam Hostel
Ques. What are the scholarships offered at Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous)?
Ans. Dadi Institute of Engineering and Technology (Autonomous) awards scholarships to the needy and meritorious students every year.
Check: DIET Visakhapatnam Scholarship
